input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Wide Leg Chino Pants'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Skinny Mid Rise Chino Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Commuter Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Commission Classic-Fit Pants in Warpstreme Fabric'
  - Name='lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Trouser 30L Warpstreme'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in Warpstreme'
  - Name='RHONE Classic Commuter Pants - Khaki'
  - Name='J.crew Essential Chino Pants'
  - Name='Men Rhone Commuter Pant'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Slim Commuter Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Commuter Slim Fit Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Commuter Slim Fit Five Pocket Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Stretch Cotton Versatwill Trousers'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Classic Canvas Trouser'
  - Name='Men's Pace Chino Stone Stone / Standard Ministry of Supply'
  - Name='Everlane Men's The Performance Chino Uniform Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Zeroed In Classic-Fit Swift Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Pants | Rhone Commuter Slim Fit Pants Menâ€™s Sz 32 Green Stretch Performance Chino | Color: Green | Size: 32 | Chomoy77's Closet'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Commission Pants'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Classic Chino Pant'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Flex Chino Pant'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Giant-fit Chino Pant'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Tech Chino Pant'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Athletic Slim-Fit Chino Pant'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's 1040 Athletic Tapered-Fit Stretch Chino Pant'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Wide Leg Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are chino pants, but the wide leg silhouette differs significantly from the Taylor Stitch's tailored straight/slightly tapered fit, reducing direct similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Skinny Mid Rise Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar chino construction and intended use; differs slightly by being skinny fit compared to Taylor Stitch's tailored straight with slight taper.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Commuter Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Commuter pants suggest a performance-oriented approach; may differ in material and intended usage from classic organic cotton chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Commission Classic-Fit Pants in Warpstreme Fabric
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic-fit dress pants in performance fabric but not chinos; different fabric and slightly different construction and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Trouser 30L Warpstreme
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit and technical fabric differ from classic organic cotton chinos; more of a tech trouser than vintage-inspired chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in Warpstreme
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit but technical fabric and trouser style less aligned with rugged, vintage-inspired chino pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: RHONE Classic Commuter Pants - Khaki
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic commuter pants in khaki shade; possibly similar in styling but likely built for performance fabric rather than organic cotton chino style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.crew Essential Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Essential chino pants closely resemble the Taylor Stitch chinos in style, materials, and function; both classic chinos with traditional cut.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men Rhone Commuter Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance commuter pant less focused on traditional chinos but similar in overall pant category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Slim Commuter Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim commuter pants focus on performance, differing from classic cotton chinos in fabric and intended durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Commuter Slim Fit Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same rationale as other Rhone commuter pants; slight difference due to focus on fit and fabric technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Commuter Slim Fit Five Pocket Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance-oriented slim commuter style with five-pocket design distinct from classic chino silhouette but moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Stretch Cotton Versatwill Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Some cotton content and slim fit relates to chinos, but technical nature and trouser styling reduce overall relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Classic Canvas Trouser
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Canvas trousers similar in sturdiness and potential style though not explicitly chinos, somewhat less relevant but closely aligned in rugged casual pant category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Pace Chino Stone Stone / Standard Ministry of Supply
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chino pants likely comparable in style though possibly more performance or technical fabric oriented; relevant but not identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's The Performance Chino Uniform Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance chino pants share chino classification; more technical fabric may reduce traditional vintage feel but similar in purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Zeroed In Classic-Fit Swift Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit but more casual performance pants different from traditional cotton chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Pants | Rhone Commuter Slim Fit Pants Menâ€™s Sz 32 Green Stretch Performance Chino | Color: Green | Size: 32 | Chomoy77's Closet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance stretch chino style commuter pants related in category but less traditional in fabric and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Commission Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Commission pants designed as performance dress trousers, less akin to rugged cotton chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Classic Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar to Taylor Stitch's Democratic Chino in cut, material, and style; traditional chino pants classification.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Flex Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit chinos similar in style and function, though potentially with stretch fabric differing from pure organic cotton.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Giant-fit Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Giant-fit indicates looser cut which differs from Taylor Stitch's tailored fit; otherwise similar chino construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Tech Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tech chino implies performance fabric; still a chino and slim fit, somewhat relevant but less traditional cotton chino feel.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Athletic Slim-Fit Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Athletic slim fit chinos closely approximate the tailored, tapered silhouette and chino style, though likely with added stretch fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's 1040 Athletic Tapered-Fit Stretch Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tapered fit and chino category aligns with Taylor Stitch silhouette and purpose; stretch fabric differs but still relevant.
